original: @96b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @96b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'a yu ga ni ta pha la bra ka sha n'a ma /
analyzed: a'a yu ga ni ta pha la bra ka sha n'a ma /
translated: Āyurgaṇitanipātapradīpikā-nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: tshe rtsis kyi 'bras bu gsal bar byed ba zhes bya ba /
analyzed: tshe rtsis kyi 'bras bu gsal bar byed ba zhes bya ba /
translated: The Clarifier of the Results of Calculating Life

original: 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Mañjughoṣa.

original: gnas skabs bzhin shes skyes bu yis //
analyzed: gnas skabs bzhin shes skyes bu yis //
translated: A person who knows the phases

original: dang po'i gnas skabs gsal 'dod na //
analyzed: dang po'i gnas skabs gsal 'dod na //
translated: wishes to clarify the initial phase.

original: mkha' @97a * //
analyzed: mkha' @97a * //
translated: The sky

original: nyi drug sogs lo yis bsgyur //
analyzed: nyi drug sogs lo yis bsgyur //
translated: is multiplied by six years and so forth.

original: de la mkha' nyis bgos thob lo //
analyzed: de la mkha' nyis bgos thob lo //
translated: The quotient divided by two is the year.

original: dag na kun bsdoms mkha' nyid grub //
analyzed: dag na kun bsdoms mkha' nyid grub //
translated: If pure, the sum of all is established as the sky.

original: so so'i me rnams mkha' dus mes //
analyzed: so so'i me rnams mkha' dus mes //
translated: The individual fires are multiplied by the sky and time fire.

original: bsgyur te mkha' nyis rnyed brtan pa'o //
analyzed: bsgyur te mkha' nyis rnyed brtan pa'o //
translated: The quotient divided by two is the stable sky.

original: rang rang brtan pa drug sogs bsgyur //🔽mkha' dus me yis thob pa lo //
analyzed: rang rang brtan pa drug sogs bsgyur // mkha' dus me yis thob pa lo //
translated: Each stable one is multiplied by six and so forth.🔽The quotient divided by the sky, time, and fire is the year.

original: lhag ma mkha' mes thob zla ba //
analyzed: lhag ma mkha' mes thob zla ba //
translated: The remainder is the sky fire quotient moon.

original: de yi lhag ma zhag tu 'gyur //
analyzed: de yi lhag ma zhag tu 'gyur //
translated: Its remainder is the days.

original: dag na rang lo'i 'gro ldog nges //
analyzed: dag na rang lo'i 'gro ldog nges //
translated: If pure, the movement and return of one's years is certain.

original: dang po'i cha shas nges rgyas shes //
analyzed: dang po'i cha shas nges rgyas shes //
translated: The initial part is known by certainty and expansion.

original: brgya sogs gsum la'ang drug la sogs //
analyzed: brgya sogs gsum la'ang drug la sogs //
translated: For three hundred and so forth, six and so forth,

original: gza' dgu so so'i lo yis bsgre //
analyzed: gza' dgu so so'i lo yis bsgre //
translated: the nine planets are multiplied by their individual years.

original: mkha' dang nyi mas thob pa lo //
analyzed: mkha' dang nyi mas thob pa lo //
translated: The result is the number of years obtained by the sun and the moon.🔽The remainder is multiplied by the sum of the sky and fire.🔽The result is the number of months obtained. The remainder is the number of days.🔽Then, all the individual years are multiplied by the sky, time, and fire.🔽The result is the number of years obtained.

original: lhag la nam mkha' me yis /
analyzed: lhag la nam mkha' me yis /
translated: The remainder is multiplied by the sum of the sky and fire.🔽The result is the number of months obtained. The remainder is the number of days.🔽Then, all the individual months are multiplied by the sum of the sky and fire.

original: bsgre // thob pa zla ba lhag ma zhag / de nas so so'i lo rnams kun //
analyzed: bsgre // thob pa zla ba lhag ma zhag / de nas so so'i lo rnams kun //
translated: The result is the number of months obtained. The remainder is the number of days.🔽If the result is not obtained,

original: mkha' dus me yis bsgyur bar bya //
analyzed: mkha' dus me yis bsgyur bar bya //
translated: the remainder is multiplied by the sum of the sky and fire.🔽The result is the number of months obtained. The remainder is the number of days.🔽If the result is not obtained,🔽the remainder is multiplied by the sum of the sky and fire.

original: zla ba mkha' mes bsgres pa sbyin //
analyzed: zla ba mkha' mes bsgres pa sbyin //
translated: The result is the number of months obtained. The remainder is the number of days.🔽If the result is not obtained,🔽the remainder is multiplied by the sum of the sky and fire.

original: mkha' ros rnyed pa brtan pa zhag / lhag ma drug cus thob chu chod //🔽de nas rang rang brtan pa rnams //🔽drug la sogs pa'i rang los bsgre //
analyzed: mkha' ros rnyed pa brtan pa zhag / lhag ma drug cus thob chu chod // de nas rang rang brtan pa rnams // drug la sogs pa'i rang los bsgre //
translated: The result is the number of months obtained. The remainder is the number of days.🔽If the result is not obtained,🔽the remainder is multiplied by the sum of the sky and fire.

original: mkha' dus mes ba gos thob pa lo //
analyzed: mkha' dus mes ba gos thob pa lo //
translated: The result is the number of months obtained. The remainder is the number of days.

original: gal te rnyed par ma gyur na //🔽mkha' mes bgos la zla ba bya //
analyzed: gal te rnyed par ma gyur na // mkha' mes bgos la zla ba bya //
translated: If the result is not obtained,🔽the remainder is multiplied by the sum of the sky and fire.

original: de yi lhag ma zhag tu 'gyur //🔽dag na lnga sogs rang gi lo //
analyzed: de yi lhag ma zhag tu 'gyur // dag na lnga sogs rang gi lo //
translated: The result is the number of months obtained. The remainder is the number of days.🔽If the result is not obtained,🔽the remainder is multiplied by the sum of the sky and fire.

original: dgu tshan re la 'gro ldog nges //
analyzed: dgu tshan re la 'gro ldog nges //
translated: The result is the number of months obtained. The remainder is the number of days.🔽If the result is not obtained,

original: cha shas phyi ma rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: cha shas phyi ma rgyas pa'o //
translated: the remainder is multiplied by the sum of the sky and fire.

original: cha shas re re drug cha re //
analyzed: cha shas re re drug cha re //
translated: The result is the number of months obtained. The remainder is the number of days.🔽If the result is not obtained,🔽the remainder is multiplied by the sum of the sky and fire.

original: phri bas brtan pa'ang drug cha 'bri //
analyzed: phri bas brtan pa'ang drug cha 'bri //
translated: The result is the number of months obtained. The remainder is the number of days.

original: de ni rtsis kyi gzhi ma yin //
analyzed: de ni rtsis kyi gzhi ma yin //
translated: If the result is not obtained,🔽the remainder is multiplied by the sum of the sky and fire.

original: bsgyur dang 'god byed mtshungs par ldan //
analyzed: bsgyur dang 'god byed mtshungs par ldan //
translated: The result is the number of months obtained. The remainder is the number of days.🔽If the result is not obtained,

original: de ltar zla klu rnams gzhi shes //
analyzed: de ltar zla klu rnams gzhi shes //
translated: Thus the months and the nāḍīs are the basis of knowledge.🔽Moreover, having understood the methods of deceiving,

original: gzhan yang tshe yi snod 'brid dang // bslu zhing bsring ba'i chog rnams //
analyzed: gzhan yang tshe yi snod 'brid dang // bslu zhing bsring ba'i chog rnams //
translated: cheating, and extending the lifespan of a patient,

original: khong du chud nas ston par gyis //
analyzed: khong du chud nas ston par gyis //
translated: you should teach.

original: rdo rje'i tshig 'byed lde mig 'di //
analyzed: rdo rje'i tshig 'byed lde mig 'di //
translated: This key to unlocking the vajra words

original: ji snyed mkhyen pas bsgyur ba'o //
analyzed: ji snyed mkhyen pas bsgyur ba'o //
translated: was translated by Jñānasiddhi.🔽The Clarification of the Calculation of Life

original: tshe 'bras kyi rtsis gsal bar byed pa ma na pu ru shas mdzad pa /
analyzed: tshe 'bras kyi rtsis gsal bar byed pa ma na pu ru shas mdzad pa /
translated: by Mananapura

original: aithi na ka ra ka ta'i bram ze lag ma ti dang / mkha' 'gro rdo rjes bsgyur//
analyzed: aithi na ka ra ka ta'i bram ze lag ma ti dang / mkha' 'gro rdo rjes bsgyur//
translated: was translated by the Indian brahman Lakṣmī and the ḍākinī Dorjé.
